Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authorization of the county of Genesee to impose a county recording tax on obligation secured by a mortgage on real property
Summary: Extends the authorization of the county of Genesee to impose a county recording tax on obligation secured by a mortgage on real property until November 1, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 579 of the laws of 2004, amending the tax law relating to authorizing the county of Genesee to impose a county recording tax on obligation secured by a mortgage on real property, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
